item.title: Loghawk
item.description: loghawk # TL;DR - Code Breaks, Fix it Faster ðŸš€ # LogHawk: # A smart alert generation tool seamlessly connecting with your logging stack (ELK/EFK), proactively notifying your team of any issues ðŸ¤« Efficiently utilize time and resources by avoiding manual RCA (Root Cause Analysis) Decrease the MTTR (Mean time to Repair) and incident response Designed for user-friendliness, resilience, and scalability ðŸ¤– Problem statement # Presently, a significant amount of resources and time are consumed when a production issue arises, despite the potential for early identification through alerts.
